definition[0]: to make someone or something be in a particular situation, especially a bad one
example[0]: It was a decision which consigned him to political obscurity.
example[1]: Many older people feel they have been consigned to the medical scrapheap.
note[0]: consign somebody/something to the dustbin/scrapheap/rubbish heap etc
definition[1]: to put something somewhere, especially in order to get rid of it
example[2]: The shoes looked so tatty that I consigned them to the back of the cupboard.
